mapper.select: SELECT sfd.id id,sfd.department_name departmentName,ssd.first_department_id fdid,ssd.id sid,ssd.second_department_name secondDepartmentName, sd.id did, sdm.`department_id` deid ,sd.`name` NAME,sd.`adeptat`,sp.`pic_path` picPath,srd.`rank_name` rank, sd.price FROM sec_first_department sfd LEFT JOIN sec_second_department ssd ON sfd.id=ssd.first_department_id LEFT JOIN sec_doctor_multipoint sdm ON sdm.`department_id`=ssd.`id` LEFT JOIN sec_doctor sd ON sd.`id` = sdm.`doctor_id` LEFT JOIN sec_pic sp ON sp.`obj_id` = sd.`id` AND sp.`obj_type`='doctor' AND sp.`type`='head' LEFT JOIN sec_rank_dic srd ON sd.`rank`=srd.`id` WHERE sfd.hospital_id=#{hospitalId} AND sdm.`hospital_id`=#{hospitalId}
select * from sec_doctor sd,sec_rank_dic srd,sec_doctor_multipoint sdm,sec_first_department sfd where sd.rank=srd.rank_code and sd.id=sdm.doctor_id and sfd.id=sdm.department_id and sfd.id=#{deptId}
select * from sec_doctor sd where sd.id=#{id}

SELECT sec_doctor.id,sec_pic.pic_path,sec_doctor.`name`,sec_rank_dic.rank_name,sec_first_department.department_name,sec_doctor.adeptat FROM sec_first_department LEFT JOIN sec_second_department ON sec_first_department.id = sec_second_department.first_department_id LEFT JOIN sec_doctor_multipoint ON sec_doctor_multipoint.department_id = sec_second_department.id LEFT JOIN sec_doctor ON sec_doctor.id = sec_doctor_multipoint.doctor_id LEFT JOIN sec_rank_dic ON sec_rank_dic.rank_code = sec_doctor.rank LEFT JOIN sec_pic ON sec_pic.`obj_id` = sec_doctor.`id` AND sec_pic.`obj_type` = 'doctor' AND sec_pic.`type` = 'head' WHERE sec_second_department.id = #{departmentId} AND sec_first_department.hospital_id=1
SELECT sum(timeframe_peoplenum) from sec_doctor_appointmenttime_timeframe where appointmenttime_id=#{id}
SELECT sum(timeframe_peoplenum1) from sec_doctor_appointmenttime_timeframe where appointmenttime_id=#{id}
SELECT timeframe from sec_doctor_appointmenttime_timeframe where id=#{id}
SELECT appointment_time FROM sec_doctor_appointmenttime where id=#{apptimeId}
